div.p: What is this IG about (in patient/non-expert friendly terms).
Additional detail/context setting for those who have significant background in the domain. (Try to make as understandable as you can, but set important context).
The main sections of this IG are:

ul.li: Volume 1 - provides business context for the implementation guide and information that implementers should be familiar with before reading the remainder of the IG. There could be multiple pages for this.
Detailed Transaction Specification - The technical details of transactions within. (Could be multiple pages for this.)
Detailed Metadata and Content Specification - The technical details of metadata and content profiles within. (Could be multiple pages for this.)
Downloads - Allows downloading a copy of this implementation guide and other useful information
